span.span: Represents a ClickOnce deployment manifest.

summary.span: 取得應用程式可在其上執行的 .NET Framework 版本。

span.span: Gets the versions of the .NET Framework that an application can run on.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool CreateDesktopShortcut { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示是否要建立桌面捷徑。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to create a desktop shortcut.

value.span: "true" 或 "false"。

span.span: "true" or "false".

value.span: 包含值的字串，這個值表示是否要建立桌面捷徑。

span.span: A string that contains a value that indicates whether to create a desktop shortcut.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DeploymentUrl { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定應用程式的更新位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the update location for the application.

value.span: 表示應用程式之更新位置的字串。

span.span: A string that indicates the update location for the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未指定這個屬性，為應用程式會不定義任何更新的位置。If this property is not specified, no update location will be defined for the application. 不過，如果未指定應用程式更新，就必須指定更新的位置。However, if application updates are specified, the update location must be specified. 指定的值應該是完整的 URL 或通用命名慣例 (UNC) 路徑。The specified value should be a fully qualified URL or Universal Naming Convention (UNC) path.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool DisallowUrlActivation { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否應該透過 URL 阻止應用程式啟動。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the application should be blocked from being started by means of a URL.

value.span: 如果透過 URL 阻止應用程式啟動，即為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if the application is blocked from being started by means of a URL otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此選項為`true`，應用程式只能從使用者的啟動**啟動**功能表。If this option is `true`, the application can only be started from the user's **Start** menu. 預設值為 `false`。The default is `false`. 如果這個選項就會忽略是`false`。This option is ignored if is `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides Property EntryPoint As AssemblyReference

public: virtual property Microsoft::Build::Tasks::Deployment::ManifestUtilities::AssemblyReference ^ EntryPoint { Microsoft::Build::Tasks::Deployment::ManifestUtilities::AssemblyReference ^ get(); void set(Microsoft::Build::Tasks::Deployment::ManifestUtilities::AssemblyReference ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定為應用程式進入點的部署參考。

span.span: Gets or sets a deployment reference that is the entry point of the application.

value.span: 物件，代表應用程式的進入點。

span.span: An object that represents the entry point of the application.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ErrorReportUrl { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定錯誤報告的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL of the error report.

value.span: 包含錯誤報告 URL 的字串。

span.span: A string that contains the URL of the error report.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Install { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出應用程式是已安裝的應用程式還是僅線上應用程式。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the application is an installed application or an online-only application.

value.span: 如果應用程式為已安裝的應用程式，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the application is an installed application; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個屬性設定為`true`，應用程式將會安裝在使用者的**啟動**功能表上，它可以移除使用**新增或移除程式**控制台 中。If this property is set to `true`, the application will be installed on the user's **Start** menu, and it can be removed by using **Add or Remove Programs** in Control Panel. 預設值為 `true`。The default is `true`. 如果這個屬性設定為`false`，應用程式僅供從網頁線上使用，僅提供線上。If this property is set to `false`, the application is intended for online use from a Web page and is available online only. > [!NOTE] > WPF 網頁瀏覽器應用程式，您必須設定屬性`true`，而且您也必須將至`false`。For WPF Web Browser Applications, you must set the property to `true`, and you must also set to `false`. 如果不符合這種情況，您會收到[MSBuild 錯誤 MSB3116](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bf04c587-d0e2-4d68-bbff-da9a985ea70e)。If this condition is not met, you will receive [MSBuild Error MSB3116](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bf04c587-d0e2-4d68-bbff-da9a985ea70e).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool MapFileExtensions { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否使用 .deploy 副檔名對應。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether .deploy file extension mapping is used.

value.span: 如果使用 .deploy 副檔名對應，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if .deploy file extension mapping is used; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個屬性設定為`true`，每個程式檔以.deploy 副檔名發行。If this property is set to `true`, every program file is published with a .deploy file extension. 這項設定適用於網頁伺服器安全性限制的數目必須在封鎖啟用 ClickOnce 應用程式部署的檔案副檔名。This setting is useful for Web server security to limit the number of file extensions that have to be unblocked to enable ClickOnce application deployment. 預設值為 `false`。The default is `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ MinimumRequiredVersion { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定應用程式的最小必要版本號碼。

span.span: Gets or sets the minimum required version number for an application.

value.span: 指出應用程式的最小必要版本號碼之字串。

span.span: A string indicating the minimum required version number for an application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果使用者的電腦低於最低必要版本，這個屬性所指定的應用程式的版本，使用者不會略過更新的選項。If the user's computer has a version of the application that is lower than the minimum required version specified by this property, the user will not have the option to skip the update. 預設為具有沒有最小必要的版本。The default is to have no minimum required version. 此輸入時，才適用設`true`。This input applies only when is set to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Product { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定應用程式的名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the application.

value.span: 表示應用程式名稱的字串。

span.span: A string that indicates the name of the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個屬性會不指定任何值，則會產生資訊清單的識別從推斷名稱。If no value is specified for this property, the name is inferred from the identity of the generated manifest. 捷徑名稱使用這個名稱在**啟動**功能表會出現在名稱的一部分且**新增或移除程式**控制台 中。This name is used for the shortcut name on the **Start** menu and is part of the name that appears in **Add or Remove Programs** in Control Panel.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Publisher { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定應用程式的發行者。

span.span: Gets or sets the publisher of the application.

value.span: 表示應用程式發行者的字串。

span.span: A string that indicates the publisher of the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個屬性會不指定任何值，則會推斷名稱，從已註冊的使用者或產生資訊清單的識別。If no value is specified for this property, the name is inferred from the registered user or from the identity of the generated manifest. 這個名稱會用於資料夾名稱的**啟動**功能表會出現在名稱的一部分且**新增或移除程式**控制台 中。This name is used for the folder name on the **Start** menu and is part of the name that appears in **Add or Remove Programs** in Control Panel.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ SuiteName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定資訊清單中定義的套件名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the suite name that is defined in the manifest.

value.span: 包含套件名稱的字串。

span.span: A string that contains the suite name.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ SupportUrl { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定應用程式連結，這個連結會出現在 [控制台] 的 [新增或移除程式] 中。

span.span: Gets or sets the link that appears in **Add or Remove Programs** in Control Panel for the application.

value.span: 表示支援 URL 的字串。

span.span: A string that indicates the support URL.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的值應該是完整的 URL 或通用命名慣例 (UNC) 路徑。The specified value should be a fully qualified URL or Universal Naming Convention (UNC) path.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ TargetFrameworkMoniker { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定表示 .NET Framework 執行階段版本的語彙基元。

span.span: Gets or sets a token that represents a version of the .NET Framework runtime.

value.span: ，表示 .NET Framework 執行階段的版本。

span.span: A that represents a version of the .NET Framework runtime.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool TrustUrlParameters { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出應用程式是否可以使用 URL 查詢字串參數。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether URL query-string parameters are available to the application.

value.span: 如果應用程式可以使用 URL 查詢字串參數，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if URL query-string parameters are available to the application; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個屬性設定為`true`，URL 查詢字串參數可用於應用程式。If this property is set to `true`, URL query-string parameters are available to the application. 預設值是`false`，指定參數將不會讓應用程式使用。The default is `false`, specifying that parameters will not be available to the application.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UpdateEnabled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示應用程式是否為可更新。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the application is updatable.

value.span: 如果應用程式可更新，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the application is updatable; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個屬性設定為`true`，是可更新的應用程式。If this property is set to `true`, the application is updatable. 預設值為 `false`。The default is `false`. 此輸入時，才適用設`true`。This input applies only when is set to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int UpdateInterval { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定應用程式的更新間隔。

span.span: Gets or sets the update interval for the application.

value.span: 表示應用程式更新間隔的整數。

span.span: An integer that indicates the update interval for the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設值是零。The default is zero. 此輸入只適用於只有當和都設定為`true`。This input only applies only when and are both set to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Build::Tasks::Deployment::ManifestUtilities::UpdateMode UpdateMode { Microsoft::Build::Tasks::Deployment::ManifestUtilities::UpdateMode get(); void set(Microsoft::Build::Tasks::Deployment::ManifestUtilities::UpdateMode value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定物件，指出是否應該先在前景檢查更新，之後才啟動應用程式，或於執行應用程式時在背景中更新。

span.span: Gets or sets an object indicating whether updates should be checked in the foreground before the application is started, or in the background while the application is running.

value.span: 物件，指出應用程式在啟動前是否檢查更新，或是在應用程式執行時檢查更新。

span.span: An object that indicates whether updates should be checked before the application is started, or while the application is running.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個屬性設定為`Foreground`，會在前景檢查更新。If this property is set to `Foreground`, updates are checked in the foreground. 預設值為 `Background`。The default is `Background`. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . 此輸入只適用於只有當和都設定為`true`。This input only applies only when and are both set to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Build::Tasks::Deployment::ManifestUtilities::UpdateUnit UpdateUnit { Microsoft::Build::Tasks::Deployment::ManifestUtilities::UpdateUnit get(); void set(Microsoft::Build::Tasks::Deployment::ManifestUtilities::UpdateUnit value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定用於 屬性的單位。

span.span: Gets or sets the units used for the property.

value.span: 物件，表示用於 屬性的單位。

span.span: An object that indicates the units used for the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可用的更新間隔使用的單位的值如下： `Days`， `Hours`，和`Weeks`。The following values are available for the units used for the update interval: `Days`, `Hours`, and `Weeks`. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . 此輸入只適用於只有當和都設定為`true`。This input only applies only when and are both set to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Validate() cil managed

summary.span: 執行各種檢查，以確認資訊清單是否有效。

span.span: Performs various checks to verify the validity of the manifest.

summary.span: 在 物件中會報告任何產生的錯誤或警告。

span.span: Any resulting errors or warnings are reported in the object.
